message.name: ERR_MEETING_SUBJECT_MISSING
message.locale: Meeting subject must be entered.

message.name: ERR_MEETING_ORGANIZER_MISSING
message.locale: Meeting organizer must be entered.
Meeting organiser must be entered.

message.name: ERR_MEETING_STARTTIME_MISSING
message.locale: Meeting start time must be entered.

message.name: ERR_MEETING_ENDTIME_MISSING
message.locale: Meeting end time must be entered.

message.name: INF_SEND_MEETING_REQUEST_NOT_SET
message.locale: A meeting request was not issued to the attendee(s) as the system administrator specified not to send meeting requests.

message.name: INF_MEETING_REQUEST_NOT_SENT_ATTENDEE
message.locale: A meeting request was not issued to '%1s' as they do not have a valid email address.

message.name: INF_MEETING_REQUEST_NOT_SENT_ORGANIZER
message.locale: A meeting request was not sent to you as you do not have a valid email address.

message.name: INF_SEND_MEETING_REQUEST_NOT_SET_MEETING_IN_PAST
message.locale: A meeting request was not issued to the attendee(s) as the meeting was scheduled in the past.

message.name: INF_MEETING_CONFLICT_ATTENDEE
message.locale: This meeting conflicts with an existing meeting in %1s's calendar.

message.name: INF_MEETING_CONFLICT_ORGANIZER
message.locale: This meeting conflicts with an existing meeting in your calendar.

message.name: INF_MEETING_REQUEST_MESSAGE_HEADER_WHEN
message.locale: When: %1s

message.name: INF_MEETING_REQUEST_MESSAGE_HEADER_DURATION
message.locale: Duration: %1s

message.name: INF_MEETING_REQUEST_MESSAGE_HEADER_WHERE
message.locale: Where: %1s

message.name: INF_MEETING_REQUEST_MESSAGE_HEADER_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: Meeting request related to: %1s

message.name: INF_MEETING_RESPONSE_CONNECTING_TO_MAIL_STORE
message.locale: Connecting to email store using the following properties [%1s].

message.name: INF_MEETING_RESPONSE_CONNECT_TO_MAIL_STORE_SUCCESS
message.locale: Connected to meeting response email store.

message.name: INF_MEETING_RESPONSE_MESSAGES_FOUND
message.locale: Found [%1s] messages in meeting response message folder.

message.name: INF_MEETING_RESPONSE_PROCESSING_MESSAGE
message.locale: Processing message with subject [%1s].

message.name: INF_MEETING_RESPONSE_INVALID_RESPONSE_MESSAGE
message.locale: Message with subject [%1s] does not contain a valid iCalendar response.

message.name: INF_MEETING_RESPONSE_DELETEING_MESSAGE
message.locale: Flagging message with subject [%1s] for deletion.

message.name: INF_MEETING_RESPONSE_ATTENDEE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Attendee [%1s] was not found in the list of active attendees for meeting [%2s]. Meeting response not processed.

message.name: INF_MEETING_RESPONSE_PROCESSED
message.locale: Meeting response from attendee [%1s] for meeting [%2s] was processed successfully.

message.name: ERR_MEETING_RESPONSE_PROCESSING_EXCEPTION
message.locale: Exception occurred processing the meeting response message with subject [%1s] from [%2s].
